title: Create & share list together with your friends, on anything you care about
description: Create lists inviting your friends to collaborate on, we are sure it would be productive or perhaps fun. Add text, photos, polls, links to each item, and share it without limits.

title: Engage your audience, get feedback from them not just a comment
description: Let your audience vote for and rate items in your list, let you find the best among, or perhaps add theirs own.

title: Express & Share without limiting it inside a photo or its caption
description: Movies, Music, Shows, Places, Photos, Links, Opinions or perhaps some random thoughts - We have made them easier to share, collaborate, & discover.

title: Powered by Human Curation & Collaboration - Better Than Any Algorithm
description: Genuine recommendations from people you know or trust beats an algorithm any day. We let people collaborate, vote upon, rate upon lists, empowering human collective intelligence.
